description: Try our easy to follow Apple Cider Chicken With Parmesan Potatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Apple Cider Chicken With Parmesan Potatoes
name: Apple Cider Chicken With Parmesan Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, combine salad leaves, cucumber, tomato, onion and vinegar in a large bowl. Season. Serve chicken with potatoes and salad.
